summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 TOYOTA SCION XD. WHILE DRIVING AT AN UNKNOWN SPEED, THE TRACTION CONTROL AND CHECK ENGINE INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC. THE TECHNICIAN STATED THAT A PART OF THE ENGINE NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED AND THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 57,000.   UPDATED 10/22/2014*LJ       THE CONSUMER STATED THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED AND THERE WAS A RECALL FOR THE SCION XB, MODEL YEAR 2006 WITH THE SAME ISSUE BUT, THIS VEHICLE WAS NOT INCLUDED. UPDATED 4/2/2015  *JS
